item.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple

play.comments: Christine with 10 gold took the second place. (Only 6 for Reixou)

one rule played wrong: When an artist retires, his resources go back to the main stock and not to the player personal stock => they are lost.
We ended up with a lot of resources at the end of the game, so it was easier to hire new artists.
With expansion Ice & Fire. 240 minutes including rules explanation (200 minutes otherwise)
Léo : 1 card / 0$ Martial : 1 card / 0$ Quentin : 2 cards / 0$ Amaury : 3 cards / 0$
Against Cthulu (13 to 3) Léo brought 4 (or 5) doom tokens on the doom track in the first round. Lost without the honors.
Léo C: 2 Fiefs & François G: 2 Fiefs (Allied) Julien: Pope, King & 1 Fief Amaury: 1 Fief
Red CivBot (Noble): 121 Purple CivBot (Noble): 119 Yellow CivBot (Chieftan): 31 (Dead) Green CivBot (Chieftan): 23 (Dead) Grey CivBot (Chieftan): 8 (Dead)

Final score is most certainly wrong due to my first play mistake
4 civbots out of 5 were eliminated Red CivBot: 72 points

play.comments: No winner since we stopped to eat pizzas

item.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple

play.comments: 2 games ended within the first 2 turns each time.
First play ended in rebellion. Not enough cooperation amongst players. François played as the Independentist card even if he wasn't.

Tie breaker:
Léo: 20 Locations built Quentin: 18 Locations built

item.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple

play.comments: with 2 Wu-Feng incarnations Barely won with all 12 locations overrun. Victory on last roll before everyone dies in their turn.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventure on the Cursed Island

play.comments: First Scenario (Naufragés) + 1 hour for explaining the rules
Stopped midgame because it was late
Martial Ended the game by offering the victory to Mathieu Emilien had to leave early

Scenario 5 (Hard)
Léo : Josh (1 hit) / Wanda François : Amy / Ned Florent : Doug / Phil

Scenario C29 Difficult - 90min
Amaury got 1 injury Everyone else got 0 Everyone got out of the map alive
Solo play Scenario 1 Started with 6 survivors Ended with 3 (3 killed in the last turn because of 4 additionnal activations for walkers)
Solo Scenario 1 Started with 4 survivors Ended with none.
Scenario 4 (Medium - 90mins) Everyone made it to the end without any injury
Forgot to stop the game at 100G$. Amaury had 92G$ at turn 8 and should have won on turn 9. Stopped on turn 10 as it was very late. So split victory with Martial ;)
2 Wins for Léo 1 Win for Florent 1 Win fr Bastien
